alert.note: Alert for Eastern Clinton; Eastern Essex; Southeastern St. Lawrence; Southern Franklin; Western Clinton; Western Essex (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Burlington (Northern Vermont and New York)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued February 04 at 12:08PM EST until February 04 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Burlington
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM EST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Heavy snow. Additional snow accumulations of 1 to 3 inches for a storm total of 9 to 17 inches. * WHERE...Portions of central, northeast, northwest and southern Vermont and northern New York. * WHEN...Until 7 PM EST this evening. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the evening commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Another round of light to moderate snow will develop this afternoon and will continue into early this evening. Snowfall rates in this next round of snow will range from a half of an inch to an inch per hour and will likely impact the evening commute. Snowfall will taper off quickly after 7 PM.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. Please allow extra time if travel is necessary.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Clinton; Eastern Essex; Southeastern St. Lawrence; Southern Franklin; Western Clinton; Western Essex
